attributes.action: give Richie Benaud OBE a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Morning Everyone

I cannot think of anyone more deserving of a knighthood than this very modest gentleman from Australia. Given an OBE for services to cricket in 1961(!), he has continued to give enjoyment to millions with his cricket commentaries from around the world.

Always stayed by his principles of broadcasting on "free to air", the British public have missed him over the past 2 years.

What a marvellous way it would be to honour such a revered cricketing hero
